example.eg: A stream flows behind their house.
example.egtrans: 一条小河从他们房子后面流过。

example.eg: There was a stream of good news.
Never before had she heard such a stream of obscenities from her son's mouth.
example.egtrans: 她以前从没有从儿子的口中听到过如此这般一连串的污言秽语。

dsense.name: stream
dsense.guideword: figurative (data: real-time audio or video) (计算机术语)

example.eg: The audio stream from the web radio station was cut after 20 minutes.
example.egtrans: 网络电台的数据流在20分钟后被切断了。

example.eg: Water came streaming out of the faucet.
example.egtrans: 水从水龙头里流了出来。

example.eg: Boudicca's long hair streamed behind her as she rode her chariot into battle.
example.egtrans: 布迪卡驾驶战车冲上战场，长发飞扬。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 飞扬, 飘扬, 飘逸

dsense.name: stream [sth]⇒
dsense.guideword: (audio, video: deliver in real time) (计算机)

example.eg: I don't have cable, but I can stream football games on my computer.
example.egtrans: 我没有有线电视，不过我能够用电脑加载观看足球比赛。

dsense.name: stream⇒
dsense.guideword: (online audio, video: broadcast live) (计算机术语)

example.eg: The video streamed from the website to my computer for 45 minutes.
example.egtrans: 那个视频从网站加载到我的电脑上花了45分钟。

example.eg: This vlogger streams from a webcam in his basement.
example.egtrans: 这位主播在地下室里通过网络摄像头进行直播。

example.eg: I knew the faucet was leaking because it sent a stream down the street.
example.egtrans: 我知道水龙头在漏水，因为它沿着街道流出了一条稳定的水流。

example.eg: Her eyes streamed with tears of joy.
They stream the kids for maths at his school.
example.egtrans: 他的学校按照不同的程度给孩子们分班上数学课。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 按照不同的程度给...分班, 分流

example.eg: Weather patterns over Northern Europe might be shifting because of a change in the jet stream.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 山间溪流, 山间小溪

example.eg: I opened the window and a stream of air rushed into the room.
Virginia Woolf is renowned for using stream of consciousness in her novels.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 意识流, 意识流散文

example.eg: The drunk yelled a stream of insults.
A steady stream of people came out of the stadium.
You could see the stream of tears on her face.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一串串泪珠, 泪珠滚滚
